summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4018 for the improvement of the alley between block 4, Pettit's University Addition and block 12, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, being the alley between 12th avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48696, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
